title: Album Page, "Recto and Verso: Sketches of Door at S....", possibly October 12, 1890
medium: Graphite on smooth, thin white wove paper mounted to off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner of sheet: 91 / Door at Se... / Oct 1890; bottom right corner of sheet: 78; verso: House at Siena / Oct 12 1890.
description: Vertical, irregular sheet with torn edges on all four sides and a very wrinkled surface. At the bottom is a small rectangular tape repair.  The sheet mainly depicts a molding profile, possibly of carved inset panels in a door.  To the right of this is an elevation of a door with four panels.  Above and two the left is a small sketch of guilloche.  The verso has a quick, rough sketch of a building elevation. Both sides of the sheet contain many inscriptions with measurements and dimensions.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Recto and Verso: Sketches of Door at S....", possibly October 12, 1890.Graphite on smooth, thin white wove paper mounted to off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-251.
